title: Question 30
description: Why were Yield Farming and Liquidity Mining done before the actual products?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value: We designed Pool 1 and Pool 2 to distribute the token to the community. Pool 1 is providing proof of capital to the network at 8% of the supply. It's to ensure decentralized governance from day 1 when the products are live. Pool 2 allows to earn additional token incentives as well as provides liquidity.
